The Messenger of God Tipiya:
Then I will call the names of monsters that you must destroy.
Turanklass , and Georgios , Angelous , Teopanis and Steregos glorified in legend as a peerless master of martial arts. Then, Tallikrom , and Maykaliya , Evangelos , Sotiris and Radzharos - great magicians who also run whole horde of minions.
Be prepared for the trials and difficult battles.
